name: Penedès Wine Tour (5 Hour Tour)
description:
WINE TOUR IN PENEDÈS TO THE JEAN LEON AND CODORNÍU WINERIES

The Penedès wine region (just 45 minutes south west of Barcelona) is one of the most important wine regions in Spain, and some of the world’s most important wine companies are located here.

The 5 Hour Penedès Wine Tour takes you to the magnificent Jean Leon winery, founded by Jean Leon in the 1960's and to beautiful Codorníu, founded in 1551 (making it one of the oldest wineries in the world) that produces cava, the local parkling wine.
